channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK for Windows
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Communications, Inc -- Zoom Workplace Apps and SDK for Windows

item.title: CVE-2024-39819|2024-07-16T15:29:36.752Z -- zoom%20communications%2C%20inc -- zoom%20workplace%20apps%20and%20sdk%20for%20windows
item.description: Improper privilege management in the installer for some Zoom Workplace Apps and SDKs for Windows may allow an authenticated user to conduct a privilege escalation via local access.
